data.title: Hear
data.copy: Choose a repetitive sound in your environment. Close your eyes. Focus on the sound.

data.title: Hear
data.copy: Close your eyes and listen to all the sounds around you.

data.title: Hear
data.copy: Listen for the next "new" sound in your environment.

data.title: Hear
data.copy: Rest your awareness on your ears. Keep your attention there as sounds come and go.

data.title: Hear
data.copy: Listen for silence, for the absence of noise. Recognize the passing of other sounds.

exerciseData.description: Include the Hear category in your practice to broaden your awareness to include the sounds around you.
